mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_no, member_email, menu_no, amount) VALUES (seq_cart_no.nextval, #{member_email}, #{menu_no}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT cart_no, member_email, p.menu_no, p.menu_name, p.menu_price, amount, p.menu_price*amount, pay_complete, order_no FROM cart c JOIN menu p ON c.menu_no = p.menu_no WHERE member_email = #{member_email} and order_no is null
SELECT NVL(SUM(menu_price * amount), 0) money FROM cart c JOIN menu p ON c.menu_no = p.menu_no WHERE member_email = #{member_email} and order_no is null
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE member_email= #{member_email} AND menu_no = #{menu_no} AND order_no is null

SELECT order_no, SUM(menu_price * amount) order_price, SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(menu_name, ',' || menu_name) ORDER BY menu_name).EXTRACT('//text()'),2) menu_name, store_name, store_tel, pay_complete, status FROM cart c JOIN menu m ON c.menu_no = m.menu_no JOIN store st ON c.store_no = st.store_no WHERE member_email = #{member_email} AND order_no is not null GROUP BY order_no, store_name, store_tel, pay_complete, status ORDER BY order_no
SELECT NVL(SUM(menu_price * amount), 0) money FROM cart c JOIN menu p ON c.menu_no = p.menu_no WHERE member_email = #{member_email} and order_no is not null

SELECT cart_no, member_email, p.menu_no menu_no, p.menu_name menu_name, p.menu_price menu_price, amount amount, p.menu_price*amount total_price, pay_complete, order_no, order_addr, store_no, order_memo FROM cart c JOIN menu p ON c.menu_no = p.menu_no WHERE order_no = #{order_no}

SELECT order_no, SUM(menu_price * amount) order_price, SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(menu_name, ',' || menu_name) ORDER BY menu_name).EXTRACT('//text()'),2) menu_name, store_name, store_tel, pay_complete, status, order_addr, order_memo FROM cart c JOIN menu m ON c.menu_no = m.menu_no JOIN store st ON c.store_no = st.store_no WHERE status = #{status} AND order_no is not null GROUP BY order_no, store_name, store_tel, pay_complete, status, order_addr, order_memo ORDER BY order_no desc
